Reviews.Title: Nice quad splitter for the price!
Reviews.Author: Richard P. Paquin
Reviews.Content: This quad splitter worked, as advertised. It runs 24hrs a day and I'm quite satisfied. Resolution isn't HD, but to get that level of resolution you'd have to pay 5 or 6 times the cost.  For a low cost splitter, I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Does what I need.
Reviews.Author: MD "deek139"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as an inexpensive way to add additional cameras to my 4 channel DVR. It worked well and was fairly east to set up. After about 2 months the picture became distorted. I contacted the company and returned the unit. They promptly determined it was a bad unit and shipped me out a new one. I am not happy it broke but was happy with the customer service of Evertech.

Reviews.Title: Video garbage
Reviews.Author: FOXFIRE
Reviews.Content: It is not user friendly. Programing it is difficult at best. It has to be reprogramed after every power glitch.

Reviews.Title: ORDER FROM AMAZON! THEY KNOW HOW TO SCREW YOUR ORDER UP!
Reviews.Author: I'M SORRY!
Reviews.Content: Recieved wrong product. Very first two orders screwed up! Not happy camper! Will have to use someone else to purchase products. Too bad!
